snippet: Bill Cella, who has worked for many years for media agencies like Universal McCann and Magna Global, will become the new chief revenue officer at the expanded league.
abstract: Bill Cella, who has worked for many years for media agencies like Universal McCann and Magna Global, will become the new chief revenue officer at the expanded league.
lead_paragraph: Bill Cella, an executive well known in the world of media, is joining the Pacific-12 Conference as it gears up to introduce its own television networks to cover league games.

headline.main: Pac-12 Conference Hires a Veteran of Media Agencies
